title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.36 - Abandoned vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1241.36 - Abandoned vehicles

State Regulations

Any vehicle of any description which shall be left
unclaimed for a period of 24 hours at a terminal may be parked, garaged or
stored at the risk and expense of the owner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1241.36

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
